title: Ergotron WorkFit-S: Sleek and Ergonomic Sit-Stand Desk
description: The flexibility to sit or stand has changed this user's office environment for the better. The sleek, ergonomic design of the WorkFit-S allows him to get work done without the discomfort of sitting at a desk all day. Learn more about WorkFit® at http://workfit.ergotron.com
